medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever, hepatosplenomegaly, and cytopenia in a young child at presentation, suspected to have severe infection.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms presented with fever and organomegaly. Median time from presentation to diagnosis was 2 weeks, with symptoms noted from 1 day to 20 weeks.
medical_history.family_history: A family history of hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (HLH) was found in 4 children (22%), with consanguinity noted in the parents of 1 child.
